alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 11:43AM CDT until March 22 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Northeastern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1143 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Afton to 6 miles northwest of Port Gibson, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Le Tourneau and Yokena around 1150 AM CDT. Vicksburg and Rocky Springs around 1155 AM CDT. Reganton around 1200 PM CDT. Bovina around 1205 PM CDT. Utica, Flowers and Newman around 1210 PM CDT. Edwards and Youngton around 1215 PM CDT. Dry Grove around 1220 PM CDT. Raymond, Bolton and Brownsville around 1225 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Learned. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
